title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer with 5+ years of experience. You will build scalable web applications using React and Python (FastAPI/Django). Experience with PostgreSQL, Docker, and AWS is required. You will lead technical decisions and mentor junior developers.

title: Data Scientist
description: Join our ML team to build recommendation systems and NLP models. PhD or 4+ years in data science. Strong Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch, and statistical modeling. Experience with A/B testing and production ML pipelines.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Infrastructure and CI/CD expert needed. Kubernetes, Terraform, AWS. Reduce deployment times, improve reliability. 5+ years experience with cloud and automation.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build beautiful, responsive UIs with React and TypeScript. 3+ years frontend experience. Knowledge of design systems, accessibility, and performance optimization.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Design and build high-performance APIs. Python or Go. PostgreSQL, Redis, microservices. 4+ years backend development.

title: UX Designer
description: User research, wireframing, and prototyping. 3+ years UX design. Figma proficiency. Collaborate with product and engineering.

title: Security Engineer
description: Application and infrastructure security. Penetration testing, vulnerability assessment. 5+ years security experience. OWASP, compliance knowledge.

title: Junior Software Developer
description: Entry-level full stack developer. CS degree or bootcamp. Eager to learn React and Python. Mentorship provided.
